about-me-t-1: Привет, меня зовут Дьякова Ирина. Я middle разработчик и начинающий дизайнер.

w-c-i-d-tooltip-1: У меня хорошее чувство юмора. Или я так думаю. Не важно.
w-c-i-d-tooltip-3: У меня есть опыт в обучении детей и взрослых. Так же я умею самостоятельно обучатся без учителей. Я быстро усваиваю информацию.
w-c-i-d-tooltip-4: Did you come here for a site? An employee? Find out what I have to offer. Perhaps I have what you are looking for.
w-c-i-d-tooltip-5: I make websites painstakingly. In design, as in code, every little thing is important. Everything should be perfect! By all means!
w-c-i-d-tooltip-6: What technologies have I learned. This does not mean that these are all technologies that I work with. Learning is fun and fast. I will quickly learn a new technology if necessary.
w-c-i-d-tooltip-7: Excellent self-organization. I can organize not only my own work, but also the work of several teammates. I have experience with this.
w-c-i-d-tooltip-8: What else to write ... Hehehe. Maybe a laugh? Just laugh. I'll write something serious later. If I find something
